item.title: GM lays off 1,000 employees amid reorganization, cost-cutting
item.description: The layoffs, which were announced Friday morning via email to those impacted, were across the business.

item.title: 'Political malpractice' if Trump undoes climate-geared Biden projects, outgoing U.S. energy secretary says
item.description: Outgoing U.S. Energy Secretary Jennifer Granholm called for consistency in Washington's climate policies and global role in the green transition.

item.title: Elon Musk's xAI raising up to $6 billion to purchase 100,000 Nvidia chips for Memphis data center
item.description: Elon Musk's artificial intelligence company xAI is raising up to $6 billion at a $50 billion valuation, according to CNBC's David Faber.

item.title: Super Micro faces deadline to keep Nasdaq listing after 85% plunge in stock
item.description: Super Micro could also get a reprieve and an extension from the Nasdaq, giving it months to come into compliance.

item.title: Trump picks vaccine skeptic RFK Jr. for Health and Human Services secretary
item.description: Donald Trump had said that if elected president he would have Robert F. Kennedy Jr. "go wild on health." HHS oversees Medicare, Medicaid, the CDC and ...
